snippet: One reader suggests that if Bernie Sanders drops out now, it could actually hurt Hillary Clinton’s chances; another offers Mrs. Clinton a one-word slogan.
lead_paragraph: One reader suggests that if Bernie Sanders drops out now, it could actually hurt Hillary Clinton’s chances; another offers Mrs. Clinton a one-word slogan.

headline.print_headline: Tips on Strategy and Slogans for the Democrats
headline.main: Tips on Strategy and Slogans for the Democrats
